Benefits: Gluten Free Paraben Free DEA Free Sodium Chloride Free Sulfate Free Longer lasting color FRAMESI COLOR LOVER MOISTURE RICH SHAMPOO Dive into the deep end of moisture for your thirsty hair & indulge. Sulfate free, ultra-hydrating shampoo Advanced blend of Quinoa, Aloe Vera & vitamins combined with nourishing Shea Butter drench hair in rich moisture Weightless formula restores vitality, radiance & instantly revives dry hair Thermal and UV protectants

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 5, 2023
reviews.reviewText: I've been using this shampoo for many years. I wanted a natural shampoo. I don't want all the chemicals on my head. I love this shampoo. preserves my hair color, makes my hair smooth and has a great scent. it's a bit more money than the chemical ones but it is much better for your health and your hair. this big bottle might be $40 but it last for a good long time since you don't need a lot of it. definitely would recommend. great product

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 2, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars high quality shampoo for colored hair
reviews.reviewText: this is the only shampoo i use! i’ve been getting foils and treatments for years. this shampoo keeps my hair healthy and smells great, salon quality

reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Great for colored hair
reviews.reviewText: It's the brand my hair dresser uses : )

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on September 13, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Best shampoo for vibrant hair
reviews.reviewText: I have red hair and this stuff makes it last! Smells great! I’ve been using it since 2016

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on January 28, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Natural moisturizer not just for colored hair
reviews.reviewText: I used Framesi Moisture Rich with Quinoa and Alo Vera for many years in the past. Swithed to cheaper name brand shampoo afer I stopped coloring my hair due to rash and headaches from hair dye. Lately, my scalp and hair had become dry and I was scratching alot and finally connected the dots. Looked at several natural shampoos that aren't made for color treated hair but decided I liked Framesi ingredients and have gone back to it even though it is too expensive. My gray hair is back to soft and shiny and no more scratching. I did not give it 5 stars because I do wish it was unscented, or at lease had much less scent. Hope they can improve this by the time I need another bottle or I will look around again. But I do like the product.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on June 14, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Love This Shampoo!
reviews.reviewText: I have used this shampoo & matching conditioner for over 6yrs now after my hairdresser recommended it. It makes my hair feel so soft & silky feeling. My hairs shines like I spritzed it with a shiner but haven’t. I now keep a bottle of each in my guest bathroom so when I have guest come for a visit I recommend they try it. I get the same response each time, ‘oh my gosh my hair feels so soft and silky.’ That’s usually before they have even let their hair dry. My 8yr old granddaughter loves using this shampoo because her hair when she gets out of the shower is easy to brush, no tangles. You can’t go wrong buying this shampoo!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 17, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Love the scent! And how hydrating it is!!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on April 30, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars A great shampoo - now online,
reviews.reviewText: This is a great shampoo; the best I've ever used. Unfortunately, my hair stylist has been out for a while ... substitutes just weren't good enough. I was pleased to find it online
Very Happy with product. Will continue to order this!

This is my favorite conditioner. Smells amazing. Been using this product for time however can only find in beauty stores where you need hairdressing license so buying here is convenient.Mine came leaking a bit but have to kind of expect that.Thankyou
This is one of my fav shampoos. I colour my hair and it does help keeping colour on longer. I love the smell too!!
I love this product for my hair excellent
